name: Snatch The Wench
description:
This game was initially started for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam, which follows the theme of 'Keep it Alive'.  I was having too much fun making the game so it wasn't finished for the competition, but has now become a project I am going to continue to develop.

  • ENJOY THE GAME?

Hopefully one day soon I'll be able to quit my job and take up game development full-time. Until that day comes, this gig is a part-time labour of love for me, so any donations are greatly welcomed. You can do this by clicking the Support this Game button underneath the game window.

The game is free to download and distribute. In fact, I encourage it. Tell your friends!

  • FUTURE UPDATES

This game is currently in development and will be updated regularly, so do check back.

v0.2 plans:

- Implement a score system and hi-score table. Incrementing points for goblins knocked down in one shot.

- More goblin types. Currently there's only Snatchers. I'm planning to introduce Grapplers in the next version; goblins that are able to grab and throw the player.

-Fouls. A referee goblin will be introduced that will stop the game with a penalty if the player either a) Knocks down the wench with a goblin or b) Tries to pick her up.

  • CONTACT

I'd love to hear any feedback, suggestions and bug reports. I can be contacted right here on itch, or on my twitter @hairy_viking
